Title: 5 Lies I used to Believe About Teaching But I Don’t Anymore (e205)
Description:
When I first started teaching, I used to believe some things about the profession that I just don’t believe anymore. In today’s final episode of season 2, I reflect on those lies and how I’ve grown in my practice.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e205
